General.Name: Nayifat Finance Co
General.Description: Nayifat Finance Company, a non-banking finance company, provides Tawarruq cash financing solutions for consumers, small and medium enterprises (SMEs), individuals and corporates in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It offers lease finance, SMEs, consumer finance, and credit card finance products. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.Nayifat Finance Company operates as a subsidiary of FALCOM Holding Company.
General.Address: FALCOM Financial Services Building, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 11417
